attributes.action: either stop pretending to care about e-petitions or to stop giving glib off the shef answers to them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every answer to an e-petition I have ever seen has been a reissue os an existing answer or policy without any additional consideration having been given to it in the light of the petition. This being the case the petitions sight is a total waste off time and money.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
